summary.span: 命名空間提供進階的 GDI+ 印刷樣式功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ typography functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本圖形功能是由 命名空間所提供。Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace. 這個命名空間中的類別可以讓使用者建立和使用字型集合。The classes in this namespace allow users to create and use collections of fonts. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援在 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 嘗試使用這些類別內其中一個應用程式類型可能會產生非預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
